scenario.title: Feedback on Project Communication (User has Low Empathy)
scenario.description: An Assistant (playing a direct report, Sam) expresses that they are struggling, and the User (playing a manager) responds with a lack of empathy.

transcript.speaker: Assistant
transcript.message: Thanks for meeting with me. To be honest, I've been having a hard time keeping up with the project's demands lately, and I know my communication has suffered. I apologize for that.

transcript.speaker: User
transcript.message: So you're saying you can't handle the workload.

transcript.speaker: Assistant
transcript.message: It's not that. I had a personal family matter that was very stressful, and it temporarily affected my focus. I'm confident I can get back on track now.

transcript.speaker: User
transcript.message: Look, everyone has personal problems. Your family issues shouldn't impact the team's deadlines. We have a project to deliver.

transcript.speaker: Assistant
transcript.message: I understand my responsibilities. I'm not making excuses, just providing context. I am fully committed to my work and the team.

transcript.speaker: User
transcript.message: Good. Then just make sure you answer your emails from now on. The team can't afford any more mistakes from you.

transcript.speaker: Assistant
transcript.message: I will. I want to assure you that my performance will return to its usual high standard immediately.
